1.text: Bring 5 cups (1,200 ml) of water to a boil over high heat.

2.text: Uncover the pot and pour in the small tapioca pearls.

3.text: Cover the pot and turn the burner to medium.

4.text: Simmer the tapioca pearls for 8 to 13 minutes.

5.text: Turn off the burner and stir the tapioca pearls.

6.text: Pour the pearls into a strainer under cold running water.

7.text: Rest the pearls for 5 minutes before using them.

8.text: Put the tapioca, milk, and salt, into a saucepan.

9.text: Soak the tapioca pearls for 5 to 30 minutes.

10.text: Turn the burner to medium-high and stir the mixture.

11.text: Reduce the burner to low and stir in the sugar.

12.text: Cook the tapioca for 5 to 45 minutes.

13.text: Whisk 2 eggs with 1⁄2 cup (120 ml) of hot milk and stir it into the pudding.

14.text: Stir the egg mixture into the pudding and cook it for 3 to 5 minutes.

15.text: Add 1 teaspoon (4.9 ml) of vanilla and serve the tapioca pudding.
